content: the stella hat features the star stitch and a variation i call the small star stitch it is worked top down in the round and i ve included a video tutorial showing how to work the star stitches the pdf includes instructions for sizes toddler 17 child 19 small adult 21 and large adult 23 the large adult size is also available for free on my blog at https //kickincrochet com/stella-hat-crochet-pattern for my sample i used super soft baby alpaca yarn - herriot from juniper moon farm which i love it s so so soft any dk yarn should work fine
